messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Battle strategy
messages.msgSnippet: hey, Maybe the book Samurai Armies 1550-1615 by Stephen Turnbull will help. It s about $12. Anthony J. Bryant and Stephen Turnbull both have great books on
messages.messageBody:
hey,
Maybe the book "Samurai Armies 1550-1615" by Stephen Turnbull will help. It's about $12. Anthony J. Bryant and Stephen Turnbull both have great books on Samurai & pretty much everything else about them from battles to armour. Hope that helps you out.
Mark

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Battle strategy
messages.msgSnippet: ... I was wondering if anyone new were i could find out more info on samurai battle plans and strategy. Hi you could start with two books that are not too
messages.messageBody:
--- the_jigglin_penguin
<the_jigglin_penguin@...> wrote:
---------------------------------
I was wondering if anyone new were i could find out
more info on
samurai battle plans and strategy.

Hi

you could start with two books that are not too
expensive

Nagashino 1575 - S Turnbull
Sekigahara 1600 - A Bryant.

Both are excellent description of the battles with
maps and plans of the areas and formations used by the
armies involved.

paul
